column2: You can’t go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending
Most problems that you have are caused (and can only be fixed) by you
If you’re learning then you aren’t failing
Traveler, there is no path. The path is made by walking
We don’t inherit this land from our Grandparents, where just borrowing it from our children
it doesnt solve a thing, to dress it in a pretty gown. Illusion and dream
Give yourself 30 seconds of regret, then move on
n the darkest times, hope is something you give yourself. That is the meaning of inner strength
I would rather spend my life amongst the birds than waste it wishing I had wings
id then what I knew how to do. Now that I know better, I do better
he standard you walk past, is the standard you accept
iscipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most
Your grass will always be the greenest if you let it grow
Sometimes you are ahead, sometimes you are behind, the race is long and in the end it’s with yourself
il ne faut jamais rien outrer
